main.primary_sponsor: Contagious Department of the first affiliated hospital of Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, China
main.public_title: Correlation analysis of HCMV infection and hepatic transaminase after bone marrow hemopoietic stem cell transplantation surgery
main.scientific_title: Correlation analysis of HCMV infection and hepatic transaminase after bone marrow hemopoietic stem cell transplantation surgery
main.hc_freetext: HCMV infection after bone marrow transplantation surgery
main.i_freetext: Infected group:Ganciclovir administration for 8 days before transplantatioin (500mg / day, i.v.); Ganicclvir for 14days or until antigen negative conversion if there exists HCMV infection (500mg/day, ivgtt, bid). ;No infection group:The patients were divided into infection or control group based on the difference of HCMV pp65 in peripheral blood. ;

contact.address: Contagious Department of the first affiliated hospital of Zhe Jiang University, The national key laboratory of contagious diseases (18th floor, section A, 6th Building)
Contagious Department of the first affiliated hospital of Zhe Jiang University, The national key laboratory of contagious diseases (18th floor, section A, No. 6 building)

criteria.inclusion_criteria: Inclusion criteria for enrollment of patients were follow-up regularly more than 3 months after transplantation in our hospital and written informed consent.
criteria.exclusion_criteria: noneInclusion criteria for enrollment of patients were follow-up regularly more than 3 months after transplantation in our hospital and written informed consent.

primary_outcome.prim_outcome: Onset time of antigen, amounts of pp65 and IE;

source_support.source_name: The national natural science foundation, national 973 project
